sections.content:
Question:
Please tell me where to find product information and development environment and other information for the RX660.
Answer:
Refer to the details about the RX660 group from the RX family webpage. 
For in-depth technical information, please refer to the user’s manual and data sheet. 
RX660 Group Product information
RX660 Group User’s Manual: Hardware (R01UH0937)
RX660 Group Data Sheet (R01DS0393)
C/C++ Compiler Package CC-RX V3 for RX Family
Integrated Development Environment e2 studio – Eclipse Based Integrated Development Environment
Integrated Development Environment CS+ – Renesas Original Integrated Development Environment
Smart Configurator
RX Driver Package
Real-time OS RI600PX for RX Family
On-chip Debug Emulators (E2Lite, E2)
Flash Programmer
Flash Memory Programmer
Suitable Products
RX660
